sets.name: Spinjitzu Training
sets.description:
Join the ninja heroes at the dojo with this action-packed THE LEGO® NINJAGO® MOVIE™ Spinjitzu Training set, featuring a dojo wall with a scroll and 2 detachable staffs, weapon rack with 2 detachable katanas, combat training station, Garmadon combat dummy, plus 2 minifigures.

  • Includes 2 minifigures: Kai and Zane.
  • Features a dojo wall with a scroll and 2 detachable staffs, weapon rack with 2 katanas, Garmadon combat dummy and a combat training station.
  • Weapons include Kai’s 2 katanas and Zane’s bow and arrow.
  • Recreate and role-play exciting THE LEGO® NINJAGO® MOVIE™ scenes.
  • Dojo wall measures over 3” (8cm) high, 1” (4cm) wide and 1” (4cm) deep.
  • Weapon rack measures over 1” (3cm) high, 1” (3cm) wide and under 1” (1.5cm) deep.
  • Garmadon combat dummy measures over 1” (5cm) high and under 1” (2cm) wide and 1” (2cm) deep.
  • Combat training station measures over 1” (4cm) high, 1” (3cm) wide and 1” (3cm) deep.
